inline.description:
Enable account creation - false
————————————————————————————
  1. "Enable Account Creation" to false
  2. Save
  3. Use `/invite_people email@test.com` to try to send invite to an email address
  4. Log out
inline.expectedResult:
• System message: `User creation has been disabled on this server, no invite(s) sent`
  • No account create option displayed on login page

customFields.Related ticket(s): (Story - Unscheduled) Invite link should display error message right away if sign-ups are closed — MM-4724
